cause.description:
The Udjat Foundation is a Kemetic Orthodox charity dedicated to helping children, named after the Eye of God that represents health, wholeness, and protection.
1. I have come from my town, descended from my district,
2. I have done ma'at for its Lord, and satisfied Him with what He loves.
3. I spoke truly, I did right, I spoke and repeated accurately,
4. I seized the proper moment in order to stand well with others.
5. I judged between two people so as to content them both,
6. I rescued the weak from those stronger than them to the best of my ability.
7. I gave bread to the hungry, water to the thirsty, clothes to the naked and a boat to the boatless.
8. I respected the elder, protected the widow, nourished the orphan.
9. I respected my parents and raised their children.
cause.mission: Protect the children of the world.
cause.name: The House of Netjer and The Udjat Foundation for Children
